widgets_values: Optional optimizations, need Triton/sageattention to use
FPS-24, blurry bad quality video with bad composition, multiple cuts, fast and chaotic movement
At this stage I have no idea what's a good negative prompt for the model, please experiment or leave it empty.
According to the original code, prompts should start with FPS-24

!IMPORTANT!

This model is far from perfect, the results can be very random between seeds, if it seemingly doesn't work, do try simply changing seed couple of times.

Highly recommend using the live preview feature of VHS nodes, it can be enabled from ComfyUI options -> VHS
No noise added here, only the seed on the first sampler matters
This node is used to add the image as extra conditioning
Split the process to only do half the steps with cfg, as sampling without is twice as fast and doesn't have huge impact on the results.

Across from her, a mysterious agent in a tailored suit slides a briefcase toward her, his expression unreadable. The atmosphere is thick with tension as the camera slowly zooms in, emphasizing subtle glances and the flickering glow of an old chandelier.
